title: Questions.
body:
1. What is the Legacy client? I hear people say it but I don't know what it means and would like to know ^_^.

2. Should I start playing Vayne? I'm an ADC main and am thinking of learning her. Any tips would be appreciated aswell if you think I should :)

replies.body:
Usually when we refer to a Legacy client it is the current League of Legends client you are using now to play the game.

We are currently working on a big piece of work in terms of updating the underlying tech and look of our client and are referring to our old/current client as "legacy client" and currently we are going through the League Client update (I assume we are just going to call the new one the LoL client or League client).

You can read more about or even sign up for the League Client Update here - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update

As for Vayne, I think she's definitely fun to play. Hard to master though. I would look through champion.gg or probuilds.net to get a feel for what are good items/summoners/masteries and runes and watch a few guides on youtube. 

Like I said Vayne will take some time to pick up, so just remember to always review your games and think about what went wrong/right in terms of your own gameplay. That way you will learn from each Vayne game and build the intuition and experience required.

Thanks for answering both questions ^_^. I think I will try out Vayne in a norm and see if I feel like I could get better at her. Thanks for letting me know what the legacy client is as well. :)

P.S I played my first game of Vayne just then and went 25/7/9. I enjoyed the late game a lot and enjoyed demolishing the fed tanks. I got full build and it was really good although I made a lot of mistakes. Only an A+ though. Riot, I have my eyes on you -_-. Jokes aside thanks for letting me know what to do and I think I will continue playing Vayne :)

the key to playing vayne is having the right mindset, you need to believe that everyone on your team is trash and that they cant help you in a team fight, you need to create your own advantages, you need to be aggressive through out the hole game. but dont go full on ape shit and feed
